charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to Import Cocaine.    Penalty :  0 to 20 Years and or $ 1 Million $ 100.00 Special Assessment. At least a 3 Year Term of Supervised Release.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 37 mos imprs; 3 yrs SRT; all standard and mandatory conditions of supervised release apply; $100.00 Special Assessment; No fine because of the defendant's inability to pay; defendant waived right to appeal however defendant is advised of right to appeal (notified of 14 day deadline); defendant to be placed at BOP facility in which Defendant is able to work;

charges.charge_description: Importation of Cocaine.    Penalty :  0 to 20 Years and or $ 1 Million $ 100.00 Special Assessment. At least a 3 Year Term of Supervised Release.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Government's Oral Motion to Dismiss - GRANTED

charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute Cocaine .    Penalty :  0 to 20 Years and or $ 1 Million $ 100.00 Special Assessment. At least a 3 Year Term of Supervised Release.(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Government's Oral Motion to Dismiss - GRANTED

charges.charge_description: Possess with intent to distribute Cocaine.    Penalty :  0 to 20 Years and or $ 1 Million $ 100.00 Special Assessment. At least a 3 Year Term of Supervised Release.(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Government's Oral Motion to Dismiss - GRANTED
